name: Viking Of Adventure
description:
Viking Adventure Game Is Adventure Game

Fighting Monsters, Risking Your Life to Fight Monsters

The Viking Gets Lost In the forest he's all alone

With a sword he can fight ugly monsters

to hold on until you find your way home

to fight the strongest monster requires a mature strategy

think of your strategy, and fight against ugly monsters

your job is to collect coins to get the highest score

don't hesitate to join an adventure with one of the adventurers

the most interesting with the vikings
